RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore

RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore Struct Reference

#include <sessionInterface.h>

Inheritance diagram for RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Common usage:

    Session * s = ..
    
    try {
        
        s->sessionStart();
        ...
        ...
        ...
        s->sessionEnd();
        
    } catch(SessionException e) {
        RDK_ERROR_STREAM(e.what());
        s->sessionTerminate();
    } catch(...) {
        RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Unexpected exception");
        s->sessionTerminate();
    }

or:

    while(running) {
        s->wait();
        s->sessionStart();
        ...
        s->sessionEnd();
        
        sleep(1000);
        
        s->sessionStart();
        ...
        s->sessionEnd();
    }

Definition at line 66 of file sessionInterface.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::sessionStart (  )  throw (InvalidOperation) [pure virtual]

Starts a session. Every other function must be called while the session is started (or it will throw an InvalidException), with the only exception of wait().

Exceptions:
InvalidOperation Previous session was not ended properly.

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::sessionEnd (  )  throw (InvalidOperation, SyncError) [pure virtual]

Check that lock are released, all is safe, etc. Use sessionTerminate() to clear locks if sessionEnd() throws an exception.

Exceptions:
SyncError something bad
InvalidOperation session was not started

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::sessionTerminate (  )  throw () [pure virtual]

Terminates the session (unlocks This function does not throw.

virtual Url RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::getUrlContext (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns:
base url of this session

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::parseConfigFile ( Url  baseUrl,
cstr  filename 
) throw (InvalidOperation, SyncError, ParseError) [pure virtual]

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::parseArguments ( Url  baseUrl,
int  argc,
char **  argv 
) throw (ParseError, NoSuchProperty, WrongType) [pure virtual]

Parses command line arguments into properties.

Example:

 int main(argc, argv) {
    ...
    Session& s = ...
    s.addString("config/ypconfig", "yellow pages configuration", "yp.config");
    s.addInt("config/maxvictims", "maximum number of found victims", 1);
    s.parseArguments("config/", argc, argv);
    ...
 }


		/// $ main --ypconfig yp2.config --maxvictims 3
		///

Exceptions:
ParseError malformed argument list
NoSuchProperty some properties not existent
WrongType parsing error for some arguments

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::linkCreate ( Url  first,
Url  second 
) throw (NoSuchProperty) [pure virtual]

Create a link from property first to property second when the user access property first, he will actually access property second (there is a limited amount of subsequent link redirection)

If second is "unknown", nothing will happen for the moment. On subsequent operations (ex: getXXX()), it will throw.

Exceptions:
NoSuchProperty if first does not exist

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::linkRemove ( Url  first  )  throw (NoSuchProperty) [pure virtual]

Removes a link. If link is not set, nothing happens.

Exceptions:
NoSuchProperty if first does not exist

virtual RDK2::Object* RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::getValueL ( Url   )  throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation, SyncError) [pure virtual]

You can change the object, but not delete You CAN change remote properties, but changes are not propagated to the source. You should use push_update instead. If object has only default value, the default value is cloned and set as the value

Exceptions:
NoSuchProperty if url does not exist
InvalidOperation if url is not Storage
ValueNotSet if url does not have value
SyncError if not locked

virtual const RDK2::Object* RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::getValueLC ( Url   )  throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation, SyncError) [pure virtual]

Implemented in RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterface.

virtual void RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::pushUpdate ( Url  ,
RDK2::Object *  value 
) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation) [pure virtual]

No copy is made, ob belongs to the session. You can't use ob anymore.

Exceptions:

virtual const RDK2::Object* RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::queueLast ( Url   )  [virtual]

Ritorna l'ultimo oggetto nella coda

Se c'�mai stato un oggetto nella coda, allora l'ultimo oggetto �sempre conservato in modo che sia accessibile da queueLast()..

Il puntatore resta valido fino al prossimo queueLast(). Si noti che questa modalit�di accesso �perpendicolare al queueFreeze.

Exceptions:
NoSuchProperty if url does not exist
InvalidOperation if url is not Queue

The "one and only" wait on the "one and only" semaphore

Similar to queueContent.

virtual PosixConstructs::PosixSemaphore* RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionInterfaceCore::getMySemaphore (  )  [pure virtual]

This is needed to make a thread capable of waiting on other things in addition to the session. With this function the caller can use the session semaphore for other things. The pointer is property of the Session.
